SELECT id,building_number AS `name`,version FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT id,building_number,version FROM tb_basic_building WHERE bis_case=1
AND building_number LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{buildingNumber}), '%')
AND estate_id=#{estateId}
ORDER BY version DESC,id DESC) AS T GROUP BY building_number ORDER BY version DESC,building_number

SELECT id,unit_number AS `name`,version FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT id,unit_number,version FROM tb_basic_unit WHERE bis_case=1
AND unit_number LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{unitNumber}), '%')
AND building_id=#{buildingId}
ORDER BY version DESC,id DESC) AS T GROUP BY unit_number ORDER BY version DESC,unit_number

SELECT id,house_number AS `name`,version FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT id,house_number,version FROM tb_basic_house WHERE bis_case=1
AND house_number LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{houseNumber}), '%')
AND unit_id=#{unitId}
ORDER BY version DESC,id DESC) AS T GROUP BY house_number ORDER BY version DESC,house_number
